title: WCAS MATH 310-3-51 Probability and Stochastic Processes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuation of 310-2. Markov processes in continuous time, stationary process, second-order process, stochastic differential equations. Students may not receive credit for both 310-1 and any of 385, EECS 302, IEMS 202, or STAT 320-1, 383. Prerequisites: 234, 240.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0881332674 Introduction to Stochastic Processes
Hoel and Port
Waveland

subject: MATH
